controls.caption: Requires input
controls.name: requireInput
controls.description: If set, the input port must contain some initialized scalar; in other case, this function will throw an exception. If this flag is cleared, empty input port leads to returning 0.

controls.caption: Trim string
controls.name: trim
controls.description:
If set, the input string is trimmed before returning its length (all leading and trailing space are removed by standard Java String.trim() method).
If cleared, the input string is analysed as-is.
